TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElementEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlElementEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class HtmlElementEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 上定义的事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the events defined on and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `window.event`当针对非托管 HTML DOM 进行编程或为 HTML 页编写活动脚本时，封装对象上找到的相同信息。 encapsulates the same information found on the `window.event` object when programming against the unmanaged HTML DOM or when writing Active Script for HTML pages. 在大多数情况下，您可以使用 查找正在接收事件操作的 html 元素，并 查找当前事件导致我们离开的 html 元素。In most cases, you can use to find the HTML element that is receiving the event action, and to find the HTML element that the current event is causing us to leave. 但是，并非每个事件都提供了这些属性的值;查看事件的托管文档或 Internet Explorer SDK 文档中的相应文档，以了解事件是否提供此项。However, not every event supplies a value for these properties; see the managed documentation for an event, or the corresponding documentation in the Internet Explorer SDK documentation, to discover if the event supplies it. HTML DOM 中的许多事件都将发送到其父元素，除非已取消。Many events in the HTML DOM are sent to their parent elements unless they are cancelled. 这称为事件冒泡。This is known as event bubbling. 如果在 `SPAN` 中的内 `DIV` 接收一次单击，则会为第一个单击事件 `SPAN` ，并针对，然后对 `DIV` HTML 页面的元素引发 click 事件 `BODY` 。If a `SPAN` inside of a `DIV` receives a click, then a click event is raised for the `SPAN` first, then for the `DIV`, and finally for the HTML page's `BODY` element. 控制事件是否以这种方式运行。 controls whether an event will behave in this manner or not. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `HtmlDocument1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BubbleEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BubbleEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前事件是否以冒泡方式通过 HTML 文档对象模型的元素层次结构。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current event bubbles up through the element hierarchy of the HTML Document Object Model.

value.span: 如果事件冒泡，则为 ；如果事件不冒泡，则为 。

span.span: if the event bubbles; if it does not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是文档对象模型气泡中的所有事件。Not all events in the Document Object Model bubble. 托管包装公开的所有事件都 冒泡，但除外 。All of the events exposed by the managed wrapper bubble with the exception of . 对于 ， `Error` 和 `Load` 事件不冒泡。For , the `Error` and `Load` events do not bubble. `BubbleEvent` `true` 在任何这些事件中，将设置为不起作用。Setting `BubbleEvent` to `true` during any of these events will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `HtmlDocument1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientMousePosition As Point
public: property System::Drawing::Point ClientMousePosition { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置鼠标指针在文档工作区中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor in the document's client area.
The current position of the mouse cursor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `ClientMousePosition` 使鼠标指针的鼠标位置相对于文档的左上角。`ClientMousePosition` gives the mouse position of the cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the document. 如果需要相对于引发事件的元素的鼠标坐标，请使用。Use if you need the mouse coordinates relative to the element that raised the event. ## Examples 以下 HTML 文件演示了标记内部的相对定位 `TABLE` `BODY` 。The following HTML file demonstrates relative positioning of a `TABLE` inside of a `BODY` tag. ```
Text More text
``` 下面的代码示例显示了在 用户单击的元素时，、和之间的差异 `TABLE` 。The following code example displays the difference between , , and when the user clicks on an element of the `TABLE`. 将显示相对于文档工作区左上角的坐标。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the document's client area. 将显示相对于的左上角的坐标 `TABLE` 。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the `TABLE`. 如果单击其中一个文本行， 将显示相对于该元素的坐标 `TD` 。If you click on one of the lines of text, will display coordinates relative to that `TD` element. 此示例要求您已将配置 `Document_MouseDown` 为的事件的处理程序 。This example requires that you have configured `Document_MouseDown` as a handler for the event on . summary.span: 获取或设置鼠标光标相对于相对定位的父元素的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor relative to a relatively positioned parent element.

value.span: 如果父元素相对定位，则鼠标光标的位置相对于引发事件的元素的父元素的左上角。

span.span: The position of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the parent of the element that raised the event, if the parent element is relatively positioned.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在 HTML 中使用相对定位来放置相对于其父级的元素。Relative positioning is used in HTML to place an element on a page in relation to its parent. 如果某个元素是相对定位的，则此属性将返回与相同的结果 。If an element is relatively positioned, this property will return the same result as . ## Examples 以下 HTML 文件演示了标记内部的相对定位 `TABLE` `BODY` 。The following HTML file demonstrates relative positioning of a `TABLE` inside of a `BODY` tag. ```
Text/TD> More text
``` 下面的代码示例显示了在 用户单击的元素时，、和之间的差异 `TABLE` 。The following code example displays the difference between , , and when the user clicks on an element of the `TABLE`. 将显示相对于文档工作区左上角的坐标。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the document's client area. 将显示相对于的左上角的坐标 `TABLE` 。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the `TABLE`. 如果单击其中一个文本行， 将显示相对于该元素的坐标 `TD` 。If you click on one of the lines of text, will display coordinates relative to that `TD` element. 此示例要求您已将配置 `Document_MouseDown` 为的事件的处理程序 。This example requires that you have configured `Document_MouseDown` as a handler for the event on . The element toward which the mouse pointer is moving.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在鼠标事件（例如和）期间，将具有有效的值 。 will have a valid value during mouse events such as and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `HtmlDocument1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
